select p.payment_id as payment_id, p.created_who as user_id, u.name as user_name, p.product_id as product_id, p.size as size, p.count as count, d.state as state, p.created_at as time from payment as p left join delivery as d on p.payment_id = d.payment_id left join user_info as u on p.created_who = u.user_id
CAST(p.created_who AS CHAR) = #{data.name} or u.name LIKE concat('%',#{data.name},'%')
ORDER BY LOCATE(#{data.name}, p.created_who), ABS(LENGTH(p.created_who) - LENGTH(#{data.name}))
order by time DESC
LIMIT #{data.paging}, #{data.pagingSize}
